page.title: 12Teacher's Day in N.St Ives.
page.content: Our teacher begins his day at approximately six fifteen when he is awoken by the chatter of his two daughters.He baths his youngest daughter,and then organises breakfast. He makes sure he has got everything for school by 8.00.Then its a 15 minute drive. When he gets there he finishes work from the night before, answers the telephone and chats to colleagues. Lessons begin at 9.00 and he usually teaches maths until 10.10.If he is on duty he has his coffee on the playground.Then its launguage until 12.00 and sometimes P.E or swimming. After a quickly eaten sandwich he marks books and prepares lessons. He teaches projects in the afternoon and finishes with story until 3.15.He then works until 5.15,when he returns home to work with his own children!
